articles.title: Asian stocks fall as upbeat Chinese data fails to impress - Reuters
articles.description: Asian stocks weakened on Tuesday, brushing off an initial lift from better-than-expected Chinese economic data as signs of patchiness in the country's recovery weighed on investor sentiment.
articles.content: SYDNEY, April 18 (Reuters) - Asian stocks weakened on Tuesday, brushing off an initial lift from better-than-expected Chinese economic data as signs of patchiness in the country's recovery weighed on… [+3667 chars]
